complete_plan.description: Find the maintenance manual for Toro Groundsmaster 4000-D
Extract maintenance intervals and service schedule from the manual
Determine the next service date based on 500 hours of use
Send SMS with the next service date to the user

actionPlan.reasoning: The user wants maintenance information and a follow-up SMS about the next service date, which involves multiple steps: manual search, data extraction, calculation, and communication.
actionPlan.preview: Complete workflow: 1) Search for Toro Groundsmaster 4000-D manual, 2) Extract maintenance intervals, 3) Calculate next service date based on 500 hours, 4) Send SMS with the date
